item.title: Amy add a quote by Amy B. Scher
item.description: "When life kicks your ass, kick back." -- Amy B. Scher

item.title: Amy add a quote by Caroline Myss
item.description: "The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind" -- Caroline Myss

item.title: Amy add a quote by Ram Dass
item.description: "It's only when caterpillarness is done that one becomes a butterfly. That again is part of this paradox. You cannot rip away caterpillarness. The whole trip occurs in an unfolding process of which we have no control." -- Ram Dass

item.title: Amy add a quote by Amy B. Scher
item.description: "Armed with my positive attitude and inherent stubborn nature, I keep my mind focused and my life moving forward. I stop to rest, pout and even cry sometimes, but always, I get back up. Life is giving me this challenge and I will plow through it, out of breath with my heart racing if I have to." -- Amy B. Scher
